inclusion.criterion: New diagnosis of OSA by polysomnogram
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Not able to give informed consent due to psychological incapacity
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Chronic use of hypnotics for more than 6 weeks
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has COPD, OSA and obesity hypoventilation syndrome. Daughter reports increased agitation and altered mental status x 2-3 days with O2 sats 60s-70s at home.
